definition: erhua variant of 納悶|纳闷[na4 men4]
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: She wondered why they hadn't given her an answer.
sentences.chinese: 她纳闷儿为什么他们没给她回信。

sentences.english: When the class ended, he wondered why he didn't hear the cruel taunts of his fellow students.
sentences.chinese: 下课后，他纳闷儿同学们为什么没刻薄地奚落他。

sentences.english: There's something I've always been puzzled about.
sentences.chinese: 有一件事我一直纳闷儿。

sentences.english: When the class ended, he wondered why he didn"t hear the cruel taunts of his fellow students."
sentences.chinese: 下课后，他纳闷儿同学们为什么没刻薄地奚落他。

sentences.english: I’ve been puzzling ever since I set eyes on you where I saw you before.
sentences.chinese: 自从我以前在那个地方看见你之后，我一直在纳闷儿。

sentences.english: I wondered what that noise was…
sentences.chinese: 我纳闷儿那是什么声音。

sentences.english: And I wondered to myself how is that possible?
sentences.chinese: 我就纳闷儿了，怎么会这样呢？

definition: to hesitate/to have second thoughts/to be concerned/to brood (over sth)/to complain
see 百思不解[bai3 si1 bu4 jie3]
pinyin: bai3 si1 bu4 de2 qi2 jie3

definition: unable to understand/unable to get over
perfectly all right/without rhyme or reason
to not understand/to be puzzled by/indissoluble
to stare blankly/to be in a daze
